name: REFERRAL_EOB_CODES
description: This table holds the Claim Alert Explanation of Benefits (EOB) Codes attached to a referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the change to the referral. For example, if the referral is changed twice, the first change will have a line value of 1, while the second change will have a line value of 2.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: Claim Alert EOB code for the referral
